title: Friedhelm Haebermann
text:
Friedhelm Haebermann (born 24 July 1946 in <a href="Duisburg">Duisburg</a>) is a former <a href="Germany">German</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player and <a href="Manager%20%28association%20football%29">manager</a>.
Haebermann made a total of 229 appearances for <a href="Eintracht%20Braunschweig">Eintracht Braunschweig</a> in the <a href="Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a> during his playing career. He also represented <a href="West%20Germany%20at%20the%201972%20Summer%20Olympics">West Germany at the 1972 Summer Olympics</a>.
